Package com.ultreon.bubbles.entity

Class LivingEntity

java.lang.Object
com.ultreon.bubbles.game.GameObject
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.Entity
com.ultreon.bubbles.entity.LivingEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
StateHolder
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractBubbleEntity, Player
public abstract class LivingEntity extends Entity
Living Entity base class. The class for all living entities, such as the player.
